tool.name: MzTabExporter
tool.description: Exports various XML formats to an mzTab file.
tool.command:
@QUOTE_FOO@ @EXT_FOO@ #import re
## Preprocessing #if $in: mkdir in && ln -s '$in' 'in/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $in.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($in.ext)' && #end if mkdir out &&
## Main program call
set -o pipefail && @EXECUTABLE@ -write_ctd ./ && python3 '$__tool_directory__/fill_ctd.py' '@EXECUTABLE@.ctd' '$args_json' '$hardcoded_json' && @EXECUTABLE@ -ini @EXECUTABLE@.ctd #if $in: -in 'in/${re.sub("[^\w\-_]", "_", $in.element_identifier)}.$gxy2omsext($in.ext)' #end if -out 'out/output.${gxy2omsext("mztab")}'
## Postprocessing && mv 'out/output.${gxy2omsext("mztab")}' '$out' #if "ctd_out_FLAG" in $OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS && mv '@EXECUTABLE@.ctd' '$ctd_out' #end if

param.label: Input files used to generate the mzTab file
Add optional columns which are not part of the mzTab standard
Does the first IdentificationRun in the file only represent (protein) inference results
param.help: If so, read peptide information only from second to last runs

param.label: Export all PSMs instead of only the best per spectrum
Enables the test mode (needed for internal use only)

data.name: ctd_out
data.label: ${tool.name} on ${on_string}: ctd
data.filter: OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS is not None and "ctd_out_FLAG" in OPTIONAL_OUTPUTS

tool.help:
Exports various XML formats to an mzTab file.
For more information, visit http://www.openms.de/doxygen/release/2.8.0/html/TOPP_MzTabExporter.html
